items.title: Automation
items.description: The automation is a set of actions that are triggered by a trigger

trigger.title: Trigger
trigger.description: The trigger is the event that triggers the automation

anyOf.title: HTTP
anyOf.description: The HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by an HTTP request

anyOf.title: POST
anyOf.description: The POST HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a POST request

anyOf.title: GET
anyOf.description: The GET HTTP trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a GET request

anyOf.title: Database
anyOf.description: The database trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a database event

anyOf.title: Record Created
anyOf.description: The Record Created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a record being created

anyOf.title: Record Updated
anyOf.description: The Record Updated trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a record being updated

anyOf.title: Schedule
anyOf.description: The Schedule trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a schedule event

anyOf.title: Cron Time
anyOf.description: The Cron Time trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a cron time

anyOf.title: Integration Trigger
anyOf.description: The integration trigger is the event that triggers the automation

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a Calendly event

anyOf.title: Invite Created
anyOf.description: The Calendly invite created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a invite created event

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a Airtable event

anyOf.title: Invite Created
anyOf.description: The Calendly invite created trigger is a trigger that is triggered by a invite created event

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: The LinkedIn Ads trigger is triggered by LinkedIn lead events

anyOf.title: New Lead Gen Form Response
anyOf.description: Triggered when a new LinkedIn Lead Gen Form response is created

anyOf.title: Facebook
anyOf.description: The Facebook trigger is triggered by Facebook lead events

anyOf.title: New Lead
anyOf.description: Triggered when a new Facebook Lead Ad response is created

items.title: Table
items.description: The table is a collection of fields

items.title: Field
items.description: The field is a field of a table

anyOf.title: Text Field
anyOf.description: The text field is a field that can contain a text

anyOf.title: Checkbox Field
anyOf.description: The checkbox field is a field that can contain a checkbox

anyOf.title: Single Select Field
anyOf.description: The single select field is a field that can contain a single select

anyOf.title: Single Attachment Field
anyOf.description: The single attachment field is a field that can contain a single attachment

items.title: Form
items.description: The form is a collection of inputs

items.title: Input
items.description: The input is a input of a form

anyOf.title: Text Input
anyOf.description: The text input is a input that can contain a text

anyOf.title: Checkbox Input
anyOf.description: The checkbox input is a input that can contain a checkbox

anyOf.title: Select Input
anyOf.description: The select input is a input that can contain a select

anyOf.title: Attachment Input
anyOf.description: The attachment input is a input that can contain a attachment

items.title: Connection
items.description: The connection is a connection to an external service

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly connection is a connection to the Calendly API

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable connection is a connection to the Airtable API

anyOf.title: Google Gmail
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail connection is a connection to the Google Gmail API

anyOf.title: Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets connection is a connection to the Google Sheets API

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: The LinkedIn Ads connection is a connection to the LinkedIn Ads API

anyOf.title: Facebook Ads
anyOf.description: The Facebook Ads connection is a connection to the Facebook Ads API

__schema0.title: JSON Schema
__schema0.description: The JSON Schema is a schema that describes the structure of the data

__schema1.title: Action
__schema1.description: The action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: HTTP
anyOf.description: The HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: GET
anyOf.description: The GET HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: POST
anyOf.description: The POST HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Response
anyOf.description: The response HTTP action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Code
anyOf.description: The code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.description: The run typescript code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Run Javascript
anyOf.description: The run javascript code action is a code action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.description: The Filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.description: The Only continue if filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Split into paths
anyOf.description: The Split into paths filter action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Calendly
anyOf.description: The Calendly action is a action that is used to interact with the Calendly API

anyOf.title: List Webhook Subscriptions
anyOf.description: The Calendly list webhook subscriptions action is a action that lists the webhook subscriptions for a given organization

anyOf.title: Get Event Type
anyOf.description: The Calendly get event type action is a action that gets the event type for a given uuid

anyOf.title: Airtable
anyOf.description: The Airtable action is a action that is used to interact with the Airtable API

anyOf.title: List Webhook Subscriptions
anyOf.description: The Calendly list webhook subscriptions action is a action that lists the webhook subscriptions for a given organization

anyOf.title: Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets action is a action that is used to interact with the Google Sheets API

anyOf.title: Append values to a Google Sheets
anyOf.description: The Google Sheets append values action is a action that appends values to a Google Sheets spreadsheet

anyOf.title: Google Gmail
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail action is a action that is used to interact with the Google Gmail API

anyOf.title: Send an email
anyOf.description: The Google Gmail send email action is a action that sends an email

anyOf.title: LinkedIn Ads
anyOf.description: Actions to interact with LinkedIn Ads APIs

anyOf.title: Create Lead Notification Subscription (Owner Level)
anyOf.description: Creates a LinkedIn Lead Notification subscription at owner (organization) level.

anyOf.title: Fetch Lead Notification Subscriptions (Owner Level)
anyOf.description: Lists LinkedIn lead notification subscriptions for an organization.

anyOf.title: Facebook Ads
anyOf.description: Actions to interact with Facebook Ads APIs

anyOf.title: List App Subscriptions
anyOf.description: Lists subscriptions configured on the Facebook App

anyOf.title: Database
anyOf.description: The Database action is an action that is performed by the automation

anyOf.title: Create record
anyOf.description: Create a record in a database table
